name: Alessa
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.
React: Once per game, after killing an opposing character with a ranged strike: Alessa gains +1 Level and +1 HP permanently.

name: Apprentice Ramah
effect:
Deverenian / Traitor
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character targets Apprentice Ramah with a melee strike or action, kill a Deverenian in this rank: Cancel the melee strike or action. You may put a wizard spell from your discard pile into your hand.
"Worms! They are but worms beneath my ambition!"

name: Atlas of Vision
effect:
SCRIBE +4
If this character is a Seer all players play with the top card of their deck revealed.
Spend Order: Name a card type: Each player reveals the top card of their deck. If it is of the named type, that player puts it into their hand.

name: B'haya, the Fiend
effect:
Nothrog • Epic • Hero • Reaver
May begin the game in rank one instead of one Level 1 and one Level 2 Nothrog.
React: After initiative is rolled, put target character into play from your hand: Until end of turn, your opponent's characters with the same Level as the target enter play as though they were one Level higher.

name: Baudwyn, Banished Poet
effect:
Deverenian • Bard • DEFEND +6 / Exile
React: After an opposing character performs a melee or ranged strike: If the strike targeted Baudwyn, Banished Poet, spend a character within two ranks.
"Storm's tears! 'Twould seem thou canst take a jest no better than the Eternal Emperor!"

name: Binder's Staff
effect:
Weapon
Necromancers have +2 Levels for equipping this item.
React: Once per game, after this wizard kills an opposing character: Attach that character to Binder's Staff.
Spend Order: Put the attached character into play ready. Before that character dies, attach him to Binder's Staff instead.

name: Caldor Willful
effect:
Dwarf • Mentalist
Order: Spend an equipped item: Caldor has +3 Skill until end of turn.
Spend Order: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a will save (DC 9 + Caldor's Skill) or be stunned.
"Cute trick, beastie. Lemme show you what the devourers taught me..."

name: Calf KarTal
effect:
Nothrog • Monk
React: After Calf KarTal kills an opposing character: Put a Charge on Calf KarTal.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge: Perform a melee strike.
"Are you so sure of your truths?"

name: Cheat Death
effect: React: After an opposing character kills target lower Level character, inflict a wound on this cleric: Return the target to play in the same location and orientation.
"I would die a thousand times more, for another chance to become a god." - Malrog

name: Conjure Doom
effect:
While Conjure Doom is in your discard pile, your characters have -1 HP and STEALTH +9.
Order: Discard up to two cards from the top of your deck (up to four cards if this character is a Summoner). Put this card into play as a Level 4 Classless Monster with +8/+4/+2 ATK, 16 AC, +3 Skill, and 3 HP. It may enter play into an illegal rank, and enters play one rank lower for each action card discarded.

name: Dev'irga
effect:
Nothrog
Order: Remove two characters in an opposing player's discard pile from the game: Perform a melee strike.
"See how weak King Michael's reign is? He hires mercenaries just to have enough bodies to fill out a small legion."

name: Edge, Fiendblight
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
While Edge, Fiendblight is adjacent to a Barbarian, he has an additional strike (Base +1) when he attacks.
Edge, Fiendblight's melee strikes have +4 ATK against evil characters and inflict an additional wound if he is adjacent to two Barbarians.

name: Elemental Barrage
effect: Order: Target an unequipped non-Warlord character (up to two characters if it is not the first turn): If you have 5 or more characters in your discard pile, draw a card. Each target must succeed with a will save (DC 15) or return to its owner's hand.

name: Ensnare
effect: Order: Target a character within 2 ranks (up to two characters if it is not the first turn): If you have 5 or more characters in your discard pile, perform a +3 ranged strike against each target. Each target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 19) or become spent.

name: Essila, Wild Raven
effect:
Mercenary • Illusionist / Mourn
React: Once per turn: After a melee strike targets a character in this rank: Cancel the strike. One of your characters in this rank performs a melee strike.
"For now I serve the Jackals, but in time I will be free..."

name: Eva Farstrider
effect:
Elf • MARKSMANSHIP +3
Eva Farstrider is a wizard and a rogue and enters play as if one Level higher.
Order: Once per turn: Until end of turn target Elf has MARKSMANSHIP +3 and may use MARKSMANSHIP on spells.
Order: Once per turn, perform a +4 ranged strike.

name: Fires of Fate
effect:
Challenge Rating 8 • 3 Charges
Warlords and Heroes have the ability "Order: Once per turn, target an equal or lower Level character in a discard pile and perform a CHARISMA check (DC 20): If successful perform an Order printed on the target. Remove a Charge from Fires of Fate. If you can't, remove Fires of Fate from the game."

name: Frozen Tears
effect:
Arrow
Scouts have +2 Levels for equipping this item.
React: After this character performs a ranged strike that hit, spend Frozen Tears: Perform a +2 ranged strike targeting the same target, and any characters adjacent to that target. These strikes spend instead of wound.

name: Gimme That
effect: Order: Target an item within three ranks: Perform an Order printed on the item as if it were equipped to this character. (Pay all costs, possibly including spending the item.)
"Such precious artifacts should be better protected." - Alessa

name: Ginerva of the Moon
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Seer
After Initiative is rolled each turn: Roll 2 d20's and place them on Ginerva of the Moon. Remove them at end of turn.
React: After a die roll, remove a d20 from Ginerva: Change the die roll to the value on the removed d20.

name: Horror of the Brine
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Ranged strikes inflict an additional wound to Horror of the Brine.
"What do you mean, 'That was just a young one?!'" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Howling Vardog
effect:
+3 Skill
Familiar
Order: Suffer a wound: Put Howling Vardog into play adjacent to this character as a 1 HP character with Level, ATK, AC, and Skill equal to this character.

name: Hymn of Kor
effect:
Dwarf
Hymn of Kor enters play one rank lower for each stunned Dwarf in your army.
Spend Order: Unstun each Dwarf within one rank.
"The monsters never do get tired of dyin', do they?"

name: Iam Unsullied
effect: Free Kingdoms Warlord • Paladin • RIPOSTE +8
"The first time I failed Toris Kelt, I searched for a purpose and found one with Aroch. If I fail Toris Kelt a second time, I will search for my own death."

name: Incite Courage
effect:
While Incite Courage is in your discard pile, your characters have +1 ATK and -2 AC.
Order: Discard up to 2 cards from the top of your deck (up to 4 cards if this character is a Cantor): Until end of turn, your characters have +1 ATK for each card discarded.
"Malrog, the cult, and Dallen all wish to poesess it, but I had the courage to steal it first." - Etal Freste

name: Ishara's Tidal Mace
effect:
Weapon
Spend Order: Target another character you control who gains a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to its Level until end of turn. Until end of turn target opposing character has a penalty to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to the bonus you gave your character.

name: Jirar Huntsman
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger • Scout • MARKSMANSHIP +2 • STEALTH +2
Jirar Huntsman is a fighter and a rogue and enters play as if one Level higher.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +4 ranged strike with a bonus to the roll equal to the number of Free Kingdoms in your discard pile.

name: Kapix the Cursed
effect:
Elf • Epic • Scout • Hero
Kapix the Cursed may start in play in rank one instead of two of your Level 1 Elves.
Spend Order: If Kapix the Cursed is in rank one, return an item equipped to target character to its owner's hand if possible. The target is -2 Levels for equipping items until end of turn.
"Replaceable. As are we all."

name: Kayle, King Rowan
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Scout
React: Once per turn, before fixing your second rank when it is illegal, remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Put an opposing Level 1 or 2 character in a discard pile into play, ready, in your first rank under your control.

name: Knights Repose
effect:
Challenge Rating 6
The first time each turn a player puts a character into play: That player may search his deck for another copy of that character and put it into play.
"The witch... the elf... she is dead." - Sir Argen Undying

name: Lady Drac
effect:
Deverenian
Lady Drac has +1 Level while in play.
React: After Lady Drac performs an Order: Lady Drac Performs an additional Order after this one.
"The elven ice fell around her like frozen spears and yet she held fast, to protect me. Whatsoever her failings may be, cowardice is not one." - Princess Dashkova

name: Lunatic's Genius
effect: React: Once per turn, after this character performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character: Search your deck for an item that this character can legally equip and put it into your hand. If the item was not an Artificer Set item, discard a card.

name: Martin Exemplar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Epic • Scout • Hero
Martin Exemplar may start the game in your discard pile instead of one of your Level 2 Free Kingdoms.
While Martin Exemplar is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms have MARKSMANSHIP +2.

name: Master of the Forge
effect:
Mercenary / Smith
Opposing players' actions may not destroy items equipped to Master of the Forge or characters adjacent to him.
"Almost done. Xod will certainly not be disappointed! With this, I may even earn my name..."

name: Mourn Jackals
effect:
Mercenary • Epic • Monster • Hero • Ethereal / Blink Dogs
Mourn Jackals may not equip items and when it starts in play, it starts in play in rank 4, not 2.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward exactly three ranks.
Order: Once per turn: Move backward exactly three ranks.

name: Neus' Helm
effect:
Helm
This is a Neus' Set item.
React: After this cleric performs an action that stuns target opposing character, spend an equipped Neus' Set item: Unstun a character with Level equal to or less than the target's.

name: Nightmaster Rress
effect:
Nothrog • Assassin / Nightwalker
Spend React: After you put a character into play, that character performs a melee strike.
"Did Kez send you? I'll kill him! I'll kill you all!"

name: Nolen, King's Guardian
effect:
Dwarf • Epic • Hero
Nolen may start in play in rank 1 instead of both of your Level 2 Dwarves.
You are considered to have an additional character in the rank behind Nolen for determining illegal ranks.
React: Once per turn, before an adjacent Dwarf suffers wounds, Nolen suffers one wound: Reduce the target's wounds by one.
"The way is sealed."

name: Novice Ruth
effect:
Free Kingdoms / Neophyte of Ishara
Novice Ruth is a cleric and a fighter.
Adjacent characters have +1 ATK for each character in this rank.
Novice Ruth has +1 AC for each character in this rank.
"I would endure anything to save my family."

name: Orazhuk of Scarab
effect:
Nothrog • Druid / Exile
Order: Once per turn, choose a character: Each opponent chooses a character other than the one you chose. Move one chosen character forward one rank and the rest backward one rank.
"Left for dead, revenge shall be mine."

name: Paralysis Ward
effect: Order: Target a character (up to two characters if it is not the first turn): If you have 5 or more characters in your discard pile, move each target backward one rank. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or they cannot perform melee or ranged strikes until end of turn.

name: Patroness Kerro
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Astral / Celestial
React: After Patroness Kerro enters play: Until end of turn your characters have +1 HP while in the first rank of your army.
"Even Deverenia's darkness cannot douse all light. Gain strength from hope, but the path will not be easy."

name: Persecutor's Emblem
effect:
Shield • DEFEND +4
Order: Spend Baiting Shield: Target a ready character within one rank and make a CHARISMA check (DC 10 + target's Skill). If successful the target performs an attack (Spending as normal). Strikes from the attack must target this character if possible. Stun the target.

name: Phantom Blades
effect:
Weapon • 3 Charges
This is a Ma'rifi Set item.
Order: Once per turn: Target an opposing character within two ranks and remove a Charge: The target must succeed with a reflex save (DC 14) or become stunned. Spent targets also suffer a wound. Stunned targets instead suffer two wounds.

name: Phoenix Fire
effect: Spend React: After an opposing character performs an action card: Perform a number of +0 ranged strikes equal to the action card's Level.
"Raining down hell itself is a most exhausting duty." - Apprentice Qultan

name: Pouncing Lunge
effect: Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank away. After the strike, if the strike hit, move the target backward one rank, and move one of your characters forward one rank.
"Faced with monsters, humans fight without thought." - Ssithiss, Sutek King

name: Quartermaster Dirge
effect:
Dwarf / Quartermaster
React: Before Quartermaster Dirge dies: Target Dwarf is +1 Level for equipping items until the end of turn, and a different target character is -1 Level for equipping items until end of turn.
"No indeed, nor do I tire of killing."

name: Qultan the Apprentice
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Illusionist
React: After one of your other wizards casts a spell: Qultan the Apprentice performs a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the spell's Level.
"I know your ways, knave, do not tempt my power!"

name: Rafkin the Impure
effect:
Elf • Druid
Spend Order: Once per turn: Choose an opposing player who targets one of their characters. The target permanently gains +2 ATK and +2 AC: Ready a number of characters whose comined Level is equal to or less than the target's Level.
"So be it. My love."

name: Reflect
effect: Spend React: After target character inflicts wounds on one of your characters: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 15 + this character's Skill) or the wounds are reduced by one and the target suffers a wound.

name: Ring of Blasting
effect:
Epic
May start in play equipped to your Warlord.
Characters in your army have -3 ATK.
Order: Remove a spell in your discard pile from the game: This wizard's spells have a +2 bonus to DC and ranged strike rolls until end of turn.
Order: Discard a spell: Your spells inflict an additional wound until end of turn.

name: Ring of Guile
effect:
Epic • STEALTH +2
May start in play equipped to your Warlord.
Characters within one rank have -2 ATK, AC, and Skill (Including this character).
"Strange that they were so easy to steal." - Alessa

name: Ring of Mending
effect:
Epic
May start in play equipped to your Warlord.
Your other characters do not unstun during the ready phase.
Spend Order: Put any number of characters into play from your hand. Discard your hand. Until end of turn characters in your army have +1 ATK, AC, and Skill for each character put into play this way.

name: Ring of Piercing
effect:
Epic
May start in play equipped to your Warlord.
You may not play characters from your hand normally.
Order: Kill one of your characters: Perform a melee strike.
"Powerful rings for fighters, rogues, clerics, and wizards alike..."

name: Ritual Circle
effect:
This is an Anathema Set item.
Order: Once per turn, spend and stun an equipped Anathema Set item: Target an Anathema Set item in your discard pile and equip it to this character.
"...and then it shall be I that wields their power!" - Essila, the Wild Raven

name: Silverwind
effect:
Weapon
This character's melee strikes cannot be cancelled or redirected.
His melee strike rolls cannot be changed or re-rolled and ignore Critical Failures.
Wounds from this character's melee strikes cannot be reduced.

name: Sir Argen Undying
effect:
Deverenian • Epic • Paladin • Hero / Rellion
May start in play in rank two instead of two of your Level 2 Deverenians.
Order: Kill a Deverenian in this rank: Ready Sir Argen Undying.
"Elven witch, I have come for your head."

name: Soul Siphon
effect:
Necromancers have +2 Levels for performing this action.
Spend Order: Target opposing character within 2 ranks must succeed with 3 consecutive magic saves (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill). For each failed save, the target loses 1 Level permanently and a character in your army gains +1 HP permanently.

name: Spidersilk Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After target opposing character enters play: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 18) or become stunned. If they were already stunned, kill the target instead.
"A candle's flame is the only way to detect it." - Forge

name: Ssithiss, Sutek King
effect:
Mercenary • Assassin • Barbarian • Monster
Ssithiss, Sutek King is a rogue and a fighter.
React: Once per turn, after a character targets a spell or ranged strike: Perform a melee strike targeting that character.

name: Stasia
effect:
Mercenary
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike targeting a character in the first rank of any army.
"The thrill of battle. How I enjoy watching their confusion when they can't see who is attacking them."

name: Stolen Destiny
effect: Spend Order: Target non-Warlord within 2 ranks must succeed with a destiny save (DC 15). If they fail, kill this character and take control of the target immediately.
"Changing thy destiny is easy. Doing so without disrupting the past is the challenge." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Stonefist Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Gargoyle • POWERATTACK +4 / Blackstone Raider
Stonefist Gargoyle is a cleric and a fighter and inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
Order: Spend another Gargoyle in your army within one rank: Perform a +6 melee strike.
"I am one of them, for now."

name: Sword-Dancer Kohn
effect:
Deverenian
Sword-Dancer Kohn has +1 HP and +3 ATK while she has a Weapon equipped and may equip two Weapons.
Order: Spend an equipped Weapon: Gain +3 AC until end of turn, or move forward one rank.

name: Tactician Muddflek
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Scout
React: After one of your Nothrog is hit by a melee strike, kill that Nothrog: The character performing the strike must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or suffer a wound.

name: Taking a Stance
effect:
While Taking a Stance is in your discard pile, your characters are -1 Level for equipping items and have POWERATTACK +4.
Order: Discard up to 2 cards from the top of your deck (up to 4 cards if this character is a Barbarian): This character has an additional strike when he attacks (Base +0) until end of turn for each character card discarded.

name: Taltos Rellion
effect:
Deverenian / Rellion
Taltos Rellion is a wizard and fighter and enters play as if he were one Level higher.
Spend Order: Return target item you control to its owner's hand. Put any number of item cards into play from your hand that you may legally play.

name: Taunting Blow
effect: React: After this fighter performs a melee strike: Characters in the target's army have -4 Skill, and a -2 penalty to ranged strike rolls until end of turn. If the strike killed the target, return Taunting Blow to your hand.
"Scared of the sunlight, beastie?" - Hymn

name: Tavern Brawl
effect:
While Tavern Brawl is in your discard pile, you have -1 hand size and your characters have RIDING +7.
Order: Discard up to 2 cards from the top of your deck (up to 4 cards if this character is a Scout): Perform a +5 ranged strike for each item card discarded this way.

name: Thekem Netheryn
effect:
Elf Warlord • Necromancer
React: Once per turn, after Thekem Netheryn kills target opposing character: Remove the target from the game and put a Level 4 or lower Elf from your discard pile into play in the same location, army, and orientation as the target. The Elf permanently gains the Undead trait.

name: Time Lightprophet
effect:
Dwarf • Seer
Spend React: After a melee strike targets a Dwarf within one rank, put Time Lightprophet on top of your deck: The target has +7 AC for the strike.
React: After Time Lightprophet enters play: Target Dwarf has +3 AC until end of turn.

name: Tome of the Adept
effect:
Epic
React: After you equip Tome of the Adept, name a feat: Tome of the Adept gains that feat at +3.
"I killed many for the book. They did not die well." - Apprentice Ramah

name: Treyik Netheryn
effect:
Elf / Priest of Bone
React: After you discard a card from your hand: Remove that card from the game.
Spend Order: Remove Treyik Netheryn from the game: Put up to 3 cards removed from the game using Treyik Netheryn's other printed ability into your hand.
"I still remember..."

name: War Mace
effect:
Weapon
This fighter has +2 ATK for each Charge on War Mace.
React: After performing a melee strike that hit: Put a Charge on War Mace.
Order: Remove three Charges: Perform a melee strike.

name: Warmistress Gurlda
effect:
Nothrog • MEDICINE +5
Warmistress Gurlda is both a cleric and a fighter and enters play as though she were 1 Level higher.
Order: Inflict a wound on Gurlda: Move forward one rank or perform a melee strike.

name: Xiantha, Centaur Soldier
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Monster
Xiantha, Centaur Soldier has +1 ATK for each rank in the opposing army to your left.
While you have 4 or more ranks in your army, Xiantha, Centaur Soldier has +2 AC and an additional strike (Base +0) when she attacks.

name: Yawning Expanse
effect: Order: Target a character within 2 ranks (up to two characters if it is not the first turn): If you have 5 or more characters in your discard pile, each target has -5 Skill until end of turn. Each target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 15) or suffer a wound.

name: Zelakin
effect:
Elf • Druid • Necromancer / Nimbic
Zelakin is a wizard and a cleric.
Spend Order: Kill Zelakin: Inflict a wound on a Monster or Undead within one rank. If you do, remove a wound from one of your Elves.
"So much to learn."
